about_the_game:
Mini-Dungeon Monthly #4


Mini-Dungeon Monthly is the official monthly RPG zine by AAW Games!

Each issue features five brand-new Mini-Dungeon adventures for 5th Edition.

Want the digital color map and token pack? Subscribe to Mini-Dungeon Monthly in PDF and print.

Five adventures included!

Avarice of the Svirfneblin Whistle Punks
An adventure for four level 1 characters by Jonathan G. Nelson

The Temple of Sorrows
An adventure for four to six characters of 1st to 3rd level by Thilo Graf

The Dirge of Centre Street
An adventure for three to four characters of 3rd-5th level by Justin Andrew Mason

A Race Against Time
An adventure for four to five characters of 10th-11th level by Stephen Yeardley

Behold a Sea of Stars
An adventure for four to five characters of 15th level by Justin Andrew Mason

Converted by: Theodore Story

Released on October 20, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
detailed_description:
Mini-Dungeon Monthly #4


Mini-Dungeon Monthly is the official monthly RPG zine by AAW Games!

Each issue features five brand-new Mini-Dungeon adventures for 5th Edition.

Want the digital color map and token pack? Subscribe to Mini-Dungeon Monthly in PDF and print.

Five adventures included!

Avarice of the Svirfneblin Whistle Punks
An adventure for four level 1 characters by Jonathan G. Nelson

The Temple of Sorrows
An adventure for four to six characters of 1st to 3rd level by Thilo Graf

The Dirge of Centre Street
An adventure for three to four characters of 3rd-5th level by Justin Andrew Mason

A Race Against Time
An adventure for four to five characters of 10th-11th level by Stephen Yeardley

Behold a Sea of Stars
An adventure for four to five characters of 15th level by Justin Andrew Mason

Converted by: Theodore Story

Released on October 20, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon Monthly #4 (5E)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
